description: Three short answer exercises in reading, writing, and critical thinking skills (each under 300 words) with feedback provided via Turnitin and virtual classes.

item: Science in Society Presentation Part A
description: Storyboard a presentation on a Science in Society topic (under 200 words + three example slides) due in Week 5.

item: Science in Society Presentation Part B
description: Four-minute PowerPoint video presentation using dramatic story arc technique, demonstrating presentation skills (eye contact, gesturing, pitch/tone) based on Part A feedback. Due in Week 7.

item: Science in Society Essay Part A
description: Draft outline and research steps (600 words) using 'And, But, Therefore' technique for discursive essay. Due in Week 8.

item: Science in Society Essay Part B
description: 1,500-word discursive essay using primary literature and academic references, incorporating feedback from Part A. Due in Week 10.
